docs.title: Should we scale insurance?
docs.text:
In the Feb 6 Columbia Climate School Hot Topics Seminar, we asked if we can responsibly scale index insurace to the global majority. Feel welcome to click through the updated presentation. Please do check out the links inside of the presentation.

If you click on next (or What People Said in the sidebar), you can see the answers people have filled out up to the timestamp of the figure for the questions the class faced.

docs.title: What people said
docs.text: Here is what people said, as of the timestamp in the figures.
